name: Max
description: Max is a friendly and energetic Labrador Retriever. He loves playing fetch and going on long walks.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is a playful and curious Beagle. She is good with other dogs and enjoys exploring the outdoors.

name: Molly
description: Molly is a sweet and affectionate Shih Tzu. She enjoys cuddling and is good with other pets.
